author: TIET Admin
content:
🎉 Exciting News! TIET has been ranked among the top 50 engineering colleges in India by NIRF 2024. This achievement reflects our commitment to academic excellence and innovation.

We thank our dedicated faculty, brilliant students, and supportive alumni for making this possible. Here's to reaching even greater heights! 🚀

author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
content:
Registration for the Annual Tech Fest 'Technovation 2024' is now open! 🔥

Event Highlights:
• Coding competitions
• Robotics challenges
• Innovation showcase
• Industry expert talks

Dates: March 25-27, 2024
Registration deadline: March 20, 2024

Don't miss this opportunity to showcase your skills and learn from the best!

author: Campus Placement Cell
content:
🎯 Placement Update: Microsoft is visiting our campus next week!

Positions available:
• Software Development Engineer
• Data Scientist
• Product Manager

Eligible branches: CSE, ECE, IT
CGPA requirement: 7.5+

Pre-placement talk: March 18, 2024 at 4:00 PM in Auditorium Hall

Best of luck to all applicants! 💪

author: Student Council
content:
📚 Library Extended Hours During Exam Season

To support students during the upcoming mid-semester examinations, the Central Library will extend its operating hours:

• Weekdays: 6:00 AM - 12:00 AM
• Weekends: 7:00 AM - 11:00 PM

Additional study spaces have been arranged in the Student Center. Group study rooms can be booked online.

Wishing everyone the best for their exams! 📖✨

author: Sports Committee
content:
🏆 Inter-College Basketball Tournament Results

Proud to announce that TIET Basketball team has won the Regional Championship! 🏀

Final Score: TIET 78 - 65 Rival College

Special congratulations to:
• Arjun Singh (Team Captain) - 24 points
• Priya Sharma - 18 points
• Rohit Kumar - 15 points

Next up: State-level championship in April. Let's cheer for our team! 🎉

author: Hostel Committee
content:
🏠 Hostel Maintenance Schedule - March 2024

Planned maintenance activities:

• Wi-Fi upgrades in all blocks (March 16-17)
• Water tank cleaning (March 20)
• Electrical safety checks (March 22-23)

There might be temporary service interruptions during these times. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your cooperation.

For any urgent issues, contact the hostel office: +91-175-2393023
